titles.title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978 to protect consumers who use natural gas fuel for agricultural irrigation pumps from certain price increases.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 3/4/1988--Introduced. Amends the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978 to provide that intrastate contracts in effect before December 1, 1986, which stipulated the purchase price for the first sale at the wellhead of natural gas for use in fueling agricultural irrigation pumps shall govern the maximum lawful price of gas under such contracts.
